abstract: Angelo Mozilo comes across as a passionate defender of Countrywide Financial in testimony released by the government, remaining defiant of criticism that it fed the subprime mortgage bubble.
snippet: Angelo Mozilo comes across as a passionate defender of Countrywide Financial in testimony released by the government, remaining defiant of criticism that it fed the subprime mortgage bubble.
lead_paragraph: More than two years after Countrywide Financial nearly collapsed under the weight of souring subprime home loans, Angelo R. Mozilo passionately defended the mortgage lender that he founded before a government panel.

headline.main: Long After Fall, Countrywide’s Mozilo Defended His Legacy
